Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER PROTECTION

Title: Relates to automatic license plate readers
Summary: Relates to automatic license plate readers (ALPRs) and mandatory postings of policies and annual reporting requirements.
LawCode: Amd ยง840, add ยง837-x, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the use of automatic license plate reader systems
